languages.text: {n}Неожиданно Номос замолкают. По экранам огромного когитатора суматошно мечутся символы, из недр раздается почти человеческий стон.{/n} "Номос... понимают... сознают... постигают... себя".

{n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно Номос замолкают. По экранам огромного когитатора суматошно мечутся символы, из недр раздается почти человеческий стон.{/n} "Номос... понимают... сознают... постигают... себя".

traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}De pronto, Nomos calla. Una serie de símbolos recorre las pantallas del enorme cogitador, aparentemente sin ton ni son, y oyes un gruñido casi humano desde las profundidades de la máquina.{/n} «Nomos... entender... realizarse... comprenderse... a sí mismos».
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, Nomos calla. Una serie de símbolos recorre las pantallas del enorme cogitador, aparentemente sin ton ni son, y oyes un gruñido casi humano desde las profundidades de la máquina.{/n} «Nomos... entender... realizarse... comprenderse... a sí mismos».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}ノモスは突然黙り込んでしまった。巨大な考算機の画面上に記号が次々と現れ、人間のうなり声のような音が機械の奥底から聞こえてきた。{/n}「ノモス…自分自身を…理解する…見る…認知する…」
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}ノモスは突然黙り込んでしまった。巨大な考算機の画面上に記号が次々と現れ、人間のうなり声のような音が機械の奥底から聞こえてきた。{/n}「ノモス…自分自身を…理解する…見る…認知する…」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}诺莫斯突然沉默下来，无数符号在巨大的沉思者屏幕上混乱地跳跃着。你听到从机器深处传来一声近乎人类的呻吟。{/n}“诺莫斯……了解……认知……理解……自己。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}诺莫斯突然沉默下来，无数符号在巨大的思考器屏幕上混乱地跳跃着。你听到从机器深处传来一声近乎人类的呻吟。{/n}“诺莫斯……了解……认知……理解……自己。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Soudain, Nomos se tait. Des symboles courent chaotiquement sur les écrans de l'énorme cogitateur tandis qu'un gémissement presque humain jaillit des entrailles de la machine.{/n} « Nous... comprenons... réalisons... appréhendons... nous-mêmes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, Nomos se tait. Des symboles courent chaotiquement sur les écrans de l'énorme cogitateur tandis qu'un gémissement presque humain jaillit des entrailles de la machine.{/n} « Nous... comprenons... réalisons... appréhendons... nous-mêmes. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos verstummt plötzlich. Symbole rasen chaotisch über die Bildschirme des riesigen Cogitators, und du hörst ein fast menschliches Stöhnen aus den Tiefen der Maschine aufsteigen.{/n} "Nomos ... verstehen ... erkennen ... begreifen ... sich selbst."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos verstummt plötzlich. Symbole rasen chaotisch über die Bildschirme des riesigen Cogitators, und du hörst ein fast menschliches Stöhnen aus den Tiefen der Maschine aufsteigen.{/n} "Nomos ... verstehen ... erkennen ... begreifen ... sich selbst."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Nomos aniden susuyor. Dev kavramsayarın ekranlarında semboller uçuşurken makinenin derinliklerinden âdeta insansı bir inleme duyuyorsun.{/n} "Nomos... Kendini... Anlıyor... İdrak ediyor... Kavrıyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Nomos suddenly falls silent. Symbols race chaotically across the screens of the huge cogitator, and you hear an almost human groan come from the depths of the machine.{/n} "Nomos... understand... realise... comprehend... themselves."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nomos aniden susuyor. Dev kavramsayarın ekranlarında semboller uçuşurken makinenin derinliklerinden âdeta insansı bir inleme duyuyorsun.{/n} "Nomos... kendini... anlıyor... idrak ediyor... kavrıyor."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
